item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

[center]I used Ric’s webclient tutorial; With a blank 317 deob, I was told it wouldn’t make a difference. I dont think I have the applet right because I get this;

[b]Below is the code I used for the play.php file.

[code]

[/code]

The thing is; Before I used a JAR maker, it would connect to the cache from my website still. (When the client is just .class files) So here’s my run.bat;

@echo off TITLE Run JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause

And for who ever can help; Here’s my client.java;

url; http://pastebin.com/m49de40c6

Here’s my signlink.java;

url; http://pbox.ca/11eat

Please help me fix this.
